verses.name: Lamentations 5:15
verses.text: The joy of our heart is ceased; our dance is turned into mourning.

verses.name: Lamentations 5:16
verses.text: The crown is fallen from our head: woe unto us, that we have sinned!

verses.name: Lamentations 5:17
verses.text: For this our heart is faint; for these things our eyes are dim.

verses.name: Lamentations 5:18
verses.text: Because of the mountain of Zion, which is desolate, the foxes walk upon it.

verses.name: Lamentations 5:19
verses.text: Thou, O Lord, remainest for ever; thy throne from generation to generation.

verses.name: Lamentations 5:20
verses.text: Wherefore dost thou forget us for ever, and forsake us so long time?

verses.name: Lamentations 5:21
verses.text: Turn thou us unto thee, O Lord, and we shall be turned; renew our days as of old.
